code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import ButtonGroup from"@material-ui/core/ButtonGroup";import AddIcon from"@material-ui/icons/Add";import RemoveIcon from"@material-ui/icons/Remove";import{DishContext}from"../../shared/context/dish-context";import'./CartButton.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartButton=function CartButton(props){var dish=useContext(DishContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ButtonGroup,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"remove",onClick:function onClick(){props.onChange(Math.max(props.count-1,0));dish.setItemCount(Math.max(dish.itemCount-1,0));},children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RemoveIcon,{fontSize:"small"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"count",children:props.count}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"add",onClick:function onClick(){props.onChange(props.count+1);dish.setItemCount(dish.itemCount+1);},children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddIcon,{fontSize:"small"})]})]});};export default CartButton;
